summary: LOSS OF POWER.  OCCURS AFTER THE FOLLOWING COMBINATION OF CONDITIONS:  1. FUEL LEVEL BELOW 1/4 TANK  2. ACCELERATING ONTO HIGHWAY WITH CIRCULAR APPROACH (RAMP) GOING CLOCKWISE.  3. VEHICLE SPEED ON CIRCULAR RAMP ABOVE 30 MPH.    VEHICLE LOSES POWER UPON ENTERING HIGHWAY.  PRESSING ACCELERATOR PEDAL GIVES ERRATIC RESULTS.    VEHICLE WILL RESET AND OPERATE PROPERLY WHEN PULLED OFF ON SHOULDER AND VEHICLE IS TURNED OFF AND THEN ON AGAIN.
